pageTitle: Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of the Addition of Sitagliptin in Participants With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Receiving Acarbose Monotherapy (MK-0431-130) - Study Results - ClinicalTrials.gov
textBeforeTable: Reporting Groups All participants randomized population. The participant flow module includes the second sequential randomization of a participant in the placebo group.
